messages.subject: What to say to friends and relatives
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/17/2005 2:17:05 PM Mountain Daylight Time, rinnyboo@yahoo.com writes: How do  unschooling parents explain to well-meaning friends or
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/17/2005 2:17:05 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
rinnyboo@... writes:

How do unschooling parents explain to well-meaning friends
or relatives why their kids aren't in school (or learning a specific
curriculum at home)?



====================================

I have a little collection, but what I said most when Kirby was not in
school and the others were too young to matter was "We're going to see how this
goes and if it stops working we'll put him in school."

_http://sandradodd.com/unschool/relatives_
(http://sandradodd.com/unschool/relatives)

(saved on another computer and not yet up there I have some other people's
suggestions, and sorry they're not all saved...)

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
